trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_SEQ_00<tab>G'raha Tia is ready to set forth.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_00<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_01<tab>Examine the console.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_03<tab>Observe activity at Base Omicron.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_04<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_TODO_05<tab>Search for the errant Omicron.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Considering the Omicrons' single-minded character, the lack of new orders does seem unusual. I agree that we should seek out their leader.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>“Pointless exercise”... What does that mean, I wonder...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>So, the console we seek lies on the far side of this isle.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_011<tab>Given the nature of the ground, the route may not be entirely direct as it seems.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_012<tab>Let us all watch our step as we make our way.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>The glow would suggest it is still operational. But how are we to interact with it...?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Greetings, Sir! Can you hear me? Say something if you can! Awaken! Activate! ...Password!
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_026<tab>...Well, I tried.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_030<tab>This appears to be the console.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_031<tab>But it seems...unresponsive.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_032<tab>Would you care to take a look at it?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_040<tab>Judging by the size of the Omicrons we've met, I'm reasonably confident the console is controlled via the orb.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You try touching, smacking, and attuning with the console, but there is no response...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_051<tab>No luck, I see.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_052<tab>But there must be a way to activate it. There must...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>I remember when we set Omega loose to deal with Shinryu...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>An Allagan weapon, we once thought. And here we are now, visiting a recreation of its home world.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_062<tab>I can only imagine how else these beings will surprise us...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_065<tab>Though I never encountered Omega myself, in conceiving the means to send the Crystal Tower to the First, we borrowed much from its mastery of the rift.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_066<tab>Indeed, so many times did I read the report of your battle, I believe I could recite it word for word.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_067<tab>Omega's miniature likeness also survived to the future, if a little worse for the wear. I must confess, I was delighted to see it again in the present.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_070<tab>Though I never encountered Omega myself, in conceiving the means to send the Crystal Tower to the First, we derived no small inspiration from its abilities.

TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_071<tab>In the course of my research, I devoured every single piece of literature I could find on the being. To think that the knowledge would prove useful here, at the edge of existence...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>Let us focus our search on the outpost.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>Alisaie and I will try speaking with the Omicrons this time, in the hopes we might learn something new.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_082<tab>Meanwhile, perhaps you and G'raha could observe them from a distance.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>These beings are systematic and routine by nature. If there are any that aren't, it shouldn't be too difficult to spot them.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>If there are no questions, then let us begin at once!
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_085<tab>As we came this way, I believe I spied a promising vantage point. Follow me.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>We will be certain to ask about the extended operations unit.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_ALISAIE_000_095<tab>Not only do they look the same; they say the same things as well...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_100<tab>And here we are. I see the twins are wasting no time with their inquiries.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_101<tab>Let us begin observing the Omicrons. They are supposed to be standing by, so we should look for any that aren't.

TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>Search Base Omicron for errant Omicrons. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target an Omicron and examine it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_111<tab>An Omicron wandering aimlessly? Where!?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_112<tab>Aha, I see it!
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_113<tab>It's left the base. Let's follow it!
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_120<tab>It's not here, but it definitely came this way. It must have used the portal.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_121<tab>Time to go through and see what we find...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_130<tab>Nothing nearby save malfunctioning units. Come─the portal awaits.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_Q1_000_135<tab>Travel through the portal?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_140<tab>Bzzzt... What is your query?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_141<tab>Ah, you found it!
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_142<tab>What are you doing here?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_143<tab>...I am looking at the tree.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_144<tab>Quite an unusual specimen... What is the device attached to it?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_145<tab>The tree is a sample collected from another star. As it cannot survive in our environment, however, it requires life support. That is the function of the device.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_146<tab>To go to such lengths to sustain it... Is there something special about this tree?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_147<tab>Being foreign matter, protocol requires that we study it. As this task has been completed, the specimen may be discarded.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_148<tab>However, when I behold the tree, I am made to feel as though...there is a problem.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_149<tab>In order to become strong, we have continued to enhance ourselves. Like we did countless others, we conquered the star whence this tree came.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_150<tab>It is the last remnant of a dead world, and there is nothing towards which it may aspire. Yet it grows. Extends its branches. Sprouts leaves. Produces seeds.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_151<tab>Why does it seek to continue?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_152<tab>Why was it made to behave in such a way, and to what end? I do not understand.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_153<tab>...I see. Out of curiosity, does this pertain to your duty?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_M017_000_154<tab>...No, it does not. My apologies, I shall return to my designated post and assume a state of combat readiness.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_155<tab>So, it was acting outside of orders...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_156<tab>Perhaps it is simply a malfunctioning Omicron. These are by no means uncommon.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_157<tab>But it may also be a unit possessed of the ability to make decisions. One not unlike Sir...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_158<tab>I believe this bears further investigation.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_159<tab>To endeavor to live even if we must depend on forces beyond our control...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_160<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. One day, when this adventure becomes a part of your epic, do you think I will be mentioned in it?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_Q3_000_161<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_A3_000_162<tab>Of course. Why wouldn't you be?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_A3_000_163<tab>Maybe in a footnote.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_A3_000_164<tab>You're not here so you can be in a story.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_165<tab>You truly think so? That would be a...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_166<tab>Nay, I shouldn't say such things until the moment comes to pass. Never mind the embarrassment...
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_167<tab>Oh, come now, how much would it have cost you to simply nod?
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_168<tab>'Tis no simple thing to earn a place beside you, this I know full well. But it is something to hope for as I forge on.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_169<tab>...Forgive me. Let there be no doubt that fame and glory could not be further from my mind.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_170<tab>And yet...I would be lying if I said that I don't relish the thought of my name being spoken in the same breath as yours.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_171<tab>...Well, we had best get on with our task.
TEXT_AKTKMG111_04460_GRAHATIA_000_172<tab>Tracking down Sir, and understanding the nature of the emotion which bars our way!
